#include <iostream>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>

#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cassert>
#include <cmath>

#define min(a,b) 	(a<b?(a):(b))
#define max(a,b) 	(a>b?(a):(b))
#define lli 		long long
#define clr(a,b) 	memset(a,b,sizeof(a))

#define S(a) 		scanf("%d",&a);
#define SL(a) 		scanf("%lld",&a);
#define SS(a) 		scanf("%s",a);
#define SA(a,n) 	{ int i;for(i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%d",&a[i]);   }
#define SLA(a,n) 	{ int i;for(i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%lld",&a[i]); }
#define PA(a,n) 	{ int i;for(i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%d ",a[i]);printf("\n");      }
#define PLA(a,n) 	{ int i;for(i=0;i<n;i++) printf("%lld ",a[i]);printf("\n");    }
#define PV(v)		{ for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++) printf("%d ",v[i]);printf("\n"); }

#define FOR(i,n)	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)

//Constants
#define INF		int(2e9)
#define INFL		lli(9e18)
#define MOD		int(1e9 + 7)

//General STL
#define tr(cont,it) 	for(typeof(cont.begin()) it = cont.begin();it!=cont.end();it++)
#define all(v)		v.begin(),v.end()

//Bitwise
#define chkbit(s, b) 	(s & (1<<b))
#define setbit(s, b) 	(s |= (1<<b))
#define clrbit(s, b) 	(s &= ~(1<<b))

//Vector
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector<pair<int,int> >
#define pb push_back

//Pair
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define lili pair<long long,long long>
#define mp make_pair

//Error Check
#define chk(a) 		cout << endl << #a << " : " << a << endl
#define chk2(a,b) 	cout << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << endl
#define chk3(a,b,c) 	cout << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << "\t" << #c << " : " << c << endl
#define chk4(a,b,c,d) 	cout << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << "\t" << #c << " : " << c << "\t" << #d << " : " << d << endl
#define gc 		getchar();

using namespace std;

int dp[1024][110];
int num[1024][110];
void preprocess()
{

}
int main()
{
    int t;//S(t);
    while(true)
    {
        int n;
        if(scanf("%d",&n)==EOF)
            return 0;
        for(int i=0;i<1024;i++)
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
                dp[i][j] = num[i][j] = 0;
        int a[n];
        int bit[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            S(a[i]);
            bit[i] = 0;
            int tmp = a[i];
            if(tmp == 0)
                setbit(bit[i],0);
            while(tmp)
            {
                int d = tmp%10;
                setbit(bit[i],d);
                tmp/=10;
            }
        }
        for(int i=0;i<1024;i++)
        {
            if((i|bit[0])==i)
            {
                dp[i][0] = a[0];
                num[i][0] = 1;
            }
            else
            {
                dp[i][0] = 0;
                num[i][0] = 0;
            }
        }
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<1024;j++)
            {
                dp[j][i] = dp[j][i-1];
                num[j][i] = num[j][i-1];
                if((bit[i]|j) == j)
                {
                    int tmp = a[i] + dp[j^bit[i]][i-1];
                    if(tmp == dp[j][i])
                        num[j][i] = max(num[j][i],num[j^bit[i]][i-1]+1);
                    else if(tmp > dp[j][i])
                    {
                        dp[j][i] = tmp;
                        num[j][i] = 1 + num[j^bit[i]][i-1];
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        /*cout << "DP Array \n";
        for(int i=0;i<8;i++,printf("\n"))
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
                printf("%3d",dp[i][j]);
        cout << "BIT Array \n";
        for(int i=0;i<8;i++,printf("\n"))
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
                printf("%3d",num[i][j]);
*/
        printf("%d\n",num[1023][n-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
